channel.title: 4. Create Internet Gateway :: AWS Intership Report
channel.description: The Internet Gateway (IGW) allows resources inside your Public Subnet to send and receive traffic from the Internet. Without it, even a subnet with public IP will still be isolated. 4.1 Create an Internet Gateway In the AWS Console, open VPC service On the left panel, select Internet Gateways Click Create internet gateway Fill in: Name tag: Workshop-IGW Click Create internet gateway
